name: Mythos (itch) (Acxelers)
description:
Travel with Mito through mythology to find your way back home.

A mythology historian named Mito is in the middle of an expedition when he finds an odd-looking door. Intrigued, he opens it and gets instantly pulled into a different space-time continuum, ending up stranded in an unknown place from which he must find a way out. 

Platform game, in each level we have to find a set number of keys to open up another door, hoping the player will find a returning way to his reality, while having to deal with enemies throughout the level.
